DC CODE ยง 2-1209.02

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: "Business incubator" means a building that provides low-cost space and services to eligible tenant businesses. The term "business incubator" does not mean a multi-tenant facility that offers space alone.
"Council" means the Council of the District of Columbia.
"Mayor" means the Mayor of the District of Columbia.
